com.facebook.buck.json

Interface ProjectBuildFileParserFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultProjectBuildFileParserFactory

    public interface ProjectBuildFileParserFactory
    Simple concrete factory so that a parser can be constructed on demand of the parse phase and be explicitly shut down afterward.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProjectBuildFileParser createParser(Iterable<String> commonIncludes, EnumSet<ProjectBuildFileParser.Option> parseOptions, Console console, ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
      Construct a new parser on demand using the provided common project build files.

        Construct a new parser on demand using the provided common project build files.
